description: three-sided lamp; back is plain wood with 2 holes at top; two other sides are stained glass panels with yellow, green and teal geometric design; white paper is taped to inside of    glass; 'bottom' of lamp comes out for inserting light bulb; another fixture (with lightbulb in place) is in the 'top' of the lamp; the inside back of lamp is lined with aluminum foil
medium: wood, glass, lead, electrical hardware, paper
title: Light Fixture
